resources.string: Welcome to Educare where learning is much easier.

If you\'re enjoying and gaining numerous knowledge in Educare a few spare coins in your pockets can help a lot by watching a few ads and subscribing to our premium account. You can help the school in giving their students the best experience to learn in this pandemic.
We would like to express our profound gratitude to the following contributors: Bantayan Science High School, and Banscie Supreme Student Government.
We would like to express our profound gratitude to the following contributors: Algobty Team
